text.text: You are engaged to the princess -
The queen gave you two her blessing and are about to soon be wed!
But you have some burning doubts...
You've heard some stories about the mythical princess' love affair.
You don't truly believe that she is being unfaithful, but in case she is, you definitely need to get rid of that fucked!
Otherwise, you might lose your opportunity of becoming a future king.
You are unhappy with the current situation of your engagement...
It is still of utmost importance to keep her alive!
